artefact.overview: Vehicle markings on lorries, trucks, HGVs, PSVs, long vehicles, school buses
artefact.body:
Vehicle markings help with visibility and give information about dangerous or hazardous loads - read a list of all vehicle markings used on UK vehicles from The Highway Code.

Download ‘Vehicle markings’ (PDF, 537KB)

details.description: Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
